TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataTemplate extends System.Windows.DataTemplate

summary.span: 表示支援 的 ，例如 或 。

span.span: Represents a that supports , such as or .

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，`ListLeagueList` 是 `League` 物件的清單。In the following example, `ListLeagueList` is a list of `League` objects. 每個 `League` 物件都有一個 `Name` 和一組 `Division` 物件集合。Each `League` object has a `Name` and a collection of `Division` objects. 每一個 `Division` 都有一個 `Name` 和 `Team` 物件的集合，並且每一個 `Team` 物件都有一個 `Name`。Each `Division` has a `Name` and a collection of `Team` objects, and each `Team` object has a `Name`. [!code-xaml[HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet#HDT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#hdt)] 此範例所示範的是，使用，您可以輕鬆地顯示包含其他清單的清單資料。The example shows that with the use of , you can easily display list data that contains other lists. 以下是範例的螢幕擷取畫面。The following is a screenshot of the example. ![HierarchicalDataTemplate 範例螢幕擷取畫面](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate 範例螢幕擷取畫面")![HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot")

remarks.format: ## Remarks `dataType`參數是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件或字串，表示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]項目。The `dataType` parameter is either a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object or a string representing an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結來源概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md)。For more information, see [Binding Sources Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定子項目的替代項目容器個數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers for the child items.

value.span: 下一層級項目的替代項目容器個數。

span.span: The number of alternating item containers for the next level of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性可讓您指定兩個或多個替代項目容器的外觀。The and properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers. 比方說，您可以指定每個第三個項目中替換背景色彩。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an . 指派給每個項目容器。The is assigned to each item container in the . 從 0 開始，遞增為止減 1 和 0 然後重新啟動。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果為 3，有七個項目中的下, 表列出每個項目。For example, if is 3 and there are seven items in the , the following table lists the for each item. |中的項目位置 Position of Item in the || |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 當您設定屬性，您將指定的子項目應該會看到在該範圍內，不具有這樣的項目套用到它。When you set the property, you are indicating that the child items should get an in that range, not the item that has this applied to it. 比方說，如果稱為`aHeaderedItemsControl`會使用與設定，項目容器的子系項目`aHeaderedItemsControl`將會有，不的項目容器`aHeaderedItemsControl`。For example, if a called `aHeaderedItemsControl` uses a with the set, the item containers of the child items of `aHeaderedItemsControl` will have an , not the item container for `aHeaderedItemsControl`. 有幾種的方法可用來指定不同的外觀的替代項目容器。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers. 其中一個方法是將繫結屬性的項目容器。One method is to bind properties of the items container to the . 然後您可以使用指定的值應該套用至有特定項目容器值。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain value. 您也可以使用觸發程序來變更項目容器的屬性值而定的值及其。You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下列範例會建立三個層級的深度，資料繫結，而每個項目會顯示在。The following example creates a that is bound to data that is three levels deep, and each item is displayed in a . 中的第一層物件具有相同的屬性值，中的第二個層級的物件使用的替代值屬性，而第三個層級中的物件使用的替代值屬性。The objects in the first level have the same property values, the objects in the second level use alternating values for the property, and the objects in the third level use alternating values for the property. 因為第一層， `Level1Data`，已屬性設定為 2，如中第二個層級的替代字，介於 0 和 1 之間的物件。Because the for the first level, `Level1Data`, has the property set to 2, the for the objects in the second level alternates between 0 and 1. 在針對第二個層級中， `Level2Data`，則的繫結至並提供要轉換至替代。In the for the second level, `Level2Data`, the of the is bound to the and an is provided to convert the to an alternating . 之間有類似的關聯性`Level2Data`並`Level3Data`:上已設定為 3 `Level2Data`，和中`Level3Ddata`具有其屬性繫結至。A similar relationship exists between `Level2Data` and `Level3Data`: The is set to 3 on `Level2Data`, and the in `Level3Ddata` has its property bound to the . [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]

summary.span: 取得或設定複製至每一個子項目的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is copied to each child item.

value.span: 複製至每一個子項目的 。

span.span: The that is copied to each child item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性，每個項目容器會取得具有相同物件當做，但之屬性的描述中的繫結的資料，例如和，是每個項目中資料的特定。When you set the property, each item container gets a that has the same objects as the , but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as and , are specific to the data for each item in the . 您必須存取項目容器的執行作業這類驗證資料，並檢查是否有錯誤的項目。You must access the item container's to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用這個屬性或屬性來設定要會影響包含資料項目的項目外觀的樣式。You use this property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 比方說，針對，產生的容器控制項，如，它們是控制項。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. ## Examples 下列範例會建立其第一個層級中的項目使用一種樣式和其第二個層級中的另一個樣式項目。The following example creates a that uses one style for items in its first level and another style for items in its second level. 設定第一層的樣式屬性。The style for the first level is set in the property of the . 設定第二個層級的樣式屬性。The style for the second level is set in the property of the . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizingTreeView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizingtreeview)] 下列範例會建立在上述範例中使用的資料。The following example creates the data that is used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#treeviewdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#treeviewdata)]

span.span: Gets or sets custom style-selection logic for a style that can be applied to each item container.

value.span: ，選擇要使用哪一個樣式做為 。

span.span: A that chooses which style to use as the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來設定要會影響包含資料項目的項目外觀的樣式。You use the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 比方說，針對，產生的容器控制項，如，它們是控制項。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 如果您有多個定義的樣式，而且必須提供邏輯以選擇要套用，則您使用屬性而非屬性。If you have more than one style defined and need to supply logic to choose which one to apply, then you use the property instead of the property. 請注意，是否將會忽略此屬性屬性設定。Note that this property is ignored if the property is set. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用的兩種樣式中的第二個層級的項目之間進行選擇。The following example creates a that uses the of a to choose between two styles for items in the second level of the . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ItemContainerStyleSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemcontainerstyleselector)] 下列範例所示前一個範例中所用。The following example shows the that is used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewItemStyleSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#treeviewitemstyleselector)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewItemStyleSelector](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#treeviewitemstyleselector)] 下列範例會建立在上述範例中使用的資料。The following example creates the data that is used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#treeviewdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#treeviewdata)]

summary.span: 取得或設定此資料範本的繫結。此資料範本會指出代表資料層中下一個層級之集合的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding for this data template, which indicates where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這會套用至屬性產生(例如或) 來指出哪裡可以找到代表資料階層中的下一個層級的集合。This is applied to the property on a generated (such as a or a ) to indicate where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱型別。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the type. ## Examples 在下列範例中，`ListLeagueList` 是 `League` 物件的清單。In the following example, `ListLeagueList` is a list of `League` objects. 每個 `League` 物件都有一個 `Name` 和一組 `Division` 物件集合。Each `League` object has a `Name` and a collection of `Division` objects. 每一個 `Division` 都有一個 `Name` 和 `Team` 物件的集合，並且每一個 `Team` 物件都有一個 `Name`。Each `Division` has a `Name` and a collection of `Team` objects, and each `Team` object has a `Name`. [!code-xaml[HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet#HDT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#hdt)] 此範例所示範的是，使用，您可以輕鬆地顯示包含其他清單的清單資料。The example shows that with the use of , you can easily display list data that contains other lists. 以下是範例的螢幕擷取畫面。The following is a screenshot of the example. ![HierarchicalDataTemplate 範例螢幕擷取畫面](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate 範例螢幕擷取畫面")![HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot")
